item.title: My First Flight
item.description: As always, it all starts with adventures and problems, and in a way that I can later laugh at. This was a similar way. IndiaFOSS 3.0 IndiaFOSS 3.0 was around the corner and we all were preparing for the conference working hard day and night without sleep. That day all of a sudden from nowhere my friends told me that my class test was announced for 26-27-28 October and IndiaFOSS 3.
